author: kkolinko
msg: Update for one field name variant used by Apache Harmony.
Do not test Method and Field handles for null, as NoSuch(Method|Field)Exception is thrown instead of null value
This aligns Tomcat 7 with patch proposed for Tomcat 6.

author: ard
msg: OCM-47 bump version numbers of some projects. Bump of junit to 4.6 resulted in failure on PropertyTest class. TestProperty is not allowed either, hence, called it OcmTestProperty.
